extracted_text:
According to searches on corporate announcements and stock market news portals, on August 24, 2025, COALINDIA Ltd. entered into a significant Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) .

Significant corporate development on August 24, 2025

New MoU signed:Coal India Limited (CIL) announced an MoU with the Mineral Resources Development, Government of Madhya Pradesh, and the Madhya Pradesh State Mining Corporation Limited. This development was published as a notice to the stock exchanges (BSE) on August 24, 2025.
